name: The Odyssey (itch) (Kacey Halstead)
description:
The Odyssey

Join Kronk, a courageous warrior on a gruelling adventure to defeat three Ancient Greek beasts. Battle enemies, complete puzzles and trek through treacherous lands to save Kronk’s home village from destruction; from the dreaded labyrinth to the unforgiving swamp, this adventure will not be easy for our hero, but he must press on and seize his destiny!

This game was made as a college project for a local museum's Retro Game Exhibition.

Made by
  • Kacey Halstead - Programmer and Designer
    • Kacey's blog
  • Jack Church - Character/Graphics Artist and Designer
    • Jack's blog
  • Hannah Hanks - Environmental Artist and Designer
